title: Emmerdale writer Sharon Marshall hints Nate or Cain will die during boat explosion stunt
text:
Get the biggest soaps stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Emmerdale storyline writer Sharon Marshall has teased there might be a death on the way, as Cain Dingle and secret son Nate Robinson go head-to-head.

Tuesday night brought the bombshell that Nate is Cain's son he had no idea about, with the newcomer having been targeting the character ever since he arrived in May.

His affair with Cain's wife Moira came to light, leading to a deadly showdown between the two men with worrying consequences.

Cain had taken the pair out on a boat on a lake, before Moira was knocked overboard - with new pictures teasing she might lose her life in the underwater stunt.

(Image: ITV)

But Sharon has now teased there could be another death on the ITV soap, as the boat the men are fighting on explodes.

She gave a preview into the big stunt from behind-the-scenes, as the boat went up in flames.

It's then that she made a comment that could suggest the fate of at least one character, amid fears someone will be killed off.

Keep up with all the soap news Life moves fast in soapland, so make sure you stay up to date with all the latest from your favourite soaps with our regular email newsletter. Sign up using this form to receive regular updates on Corrie, Emmerdale, EastEnders direct to your inbox. We'll also keep you up to date on what your favourite stars are up to in the real world too, and the breaking news as it happens.

She said of the fire: "There is no way we can film that scene and everyone is gonna get out of that shot alive.

"That proper went up."

Whether a character does lose their life in the stunt is yet to be seen, with the explosive scenes set to air in the latest episode on Wednesday night.

(Image: ITV)

The twist comes as new photos released by the ITV soap saw a lifeless Moira trapped underwater after falling from the boat in the previous episode.

It remains to be seen whether Cain will rescue his wife after her betrayal, with him on a murder mission.

Fans are predicting someone will be killed off amidst the drama, while elsewhere in the Dales Chas Dingle gives birth and Robert Sugden is preparing to be sentenced for killing Lee.

Emmerdale airs weeknights at 7pm on ITV, with an extra episode on Thursdays at 8pm.
description: Emmerdale will air an explosive stunt this week, as Cain Dingle's revenge on wife Moira and secret son Nate Robinson takes a deadly turn
